name: Hanoi Tower
author: Ihar Dounar

sections.description:
This plugin allow to place shortcode [hanoi-tower] with Hanoi Tower game to any of page of your site.
Game state keep with user session and it is mean different site visitors will have their own games which can be continued in any time while their session is a live.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
How to use plugin after installation

Activate the plugin and insert shortcode [hanoi-tower] to any of your site page and save it.

How to uninstall the plugin?

Simply deactivate and delete the plugin.

short_description: A WordPress plugin which allow users to play Hanoi Tower game on the site page. Insert shortcode [hanoi-tower] to any page of your site.
